Title: Ricksy Business
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Ryan Ridley, Tom Kauffman, Eric Acosta (staff writer), Wade Randolph (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Beth and Jerry head for an iceberg of a date leaving Rick in charge. Morty doesn't get to go on any more adventures if the house isn't in the same condition when they get back.
